citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am To
12:00m on 06-MAR-17.
Farm gate close and loked. Call and leave message at all phone numbers available, also leave a business card in
mail box
